name: College Notes Uploading System代码问题漏洞
product: ["College Notes Uploading System College Notes Uploading System 1.0"]
description: College Notes Uploading System是一个大学笔记上传系统。College Notes Uploading System存在代码问题漏洞，该漏洞源于/dashboard/userprofile.php文件中的未知函数对image参数操作处理不当。攻击者可利用该漏洞上传任意文件。
solution:
目前厂商尚未发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网：
https://code-projects.org/
